name: MusicTokenRequestError
desc: An error that the token provider or music requests can throw upon requesting any token necessary for accessing Apple Music API.

items.name: case developerTokenRequestFailed
items.desc: An error that indicates a failure in the process of fetching a developer token for the current app.

items.name: case permissionDenied
items.desc: An error that occurs when the user doesn’t consent for the current app to access their Apple Music data.

items.name: case privacyAcknowledgementRequired
items.desc: An error that occurs when the user needs to acknowledge the most recent privacy policy.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: An error indicating the ocurrence of an unknown or unexpected error.

items.name: case userNotSignedIn
items.desc: An error that occurs when the user isn’t signed in with an Apple Music account.

items.name: case userTokenRequestFailed
items.desc: An error that indicates a failure in the process of fetching a user token.

items.name: case userTokenRevoked
items.desc: An error that occurs when the user revokes permission for the current app to access their Apple Music data.

items.name: init?(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance.

items.name: var errorDescription: String?
items.desc: A localized message describing what error occurred.

items.name: var failureReason: String?
items.desc: A localized message describing the reason for the failure.

items.name: var helpAnchor: String?
items.desc: A localized message providing “help” text if the user requests help.

items.name: var rawValue: String
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: var recoverySuggestion: String?
items.desc: A localized message describing how one might recover from the failure.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.
